I've recently been looking for jewellery for every-day-wearing and immediately put these in the basket as I saw them; they arrived a day later, and honestly, I was taken by surprise at how beautiful and high quality these were. I honestly forgot the price but I do remember they were quite cheap. I've even fallen asleep with them on and they havent broken. Very satisfied, I definitely recommend these for people looking for gorgeous but at the same time simple jewellery.
